Articles.Content: I don't understand how I am supposed to export something as a .mu from blender, Can someone help?
You can't. You'll need to install Unity.

You don't.

To do .mu's, you first export your blender file as a .dae. You then open up Unity, install the Part Tools for Unity (I can't seem to find the link, will someone post it?), import your .dae file, and export it from there.

See this for a more detailed explanation: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/40178-Part-Tools-0-20-Blender-Unity-and-KSP
